title: About
text:
Hello! I’m Fernanda Rodriguez, an MBA candidate with a concentration in Business Analytics at University Canada West.
With a background in Psychology and hands-on experience in recruitment, data analysis, and retail, I bring a unique mix of analytical thinking and human insight to business challenges. I’m especially passionate about leveraging AI, data, and marketing technology to drive smarter decisions and real business value.
